text: The 1981–82 season was Clydebank's sixteenth season after being elected to the Scottish Football League. They competed in Scottish League Division One where they finished 4th. They also competed in the Scottish League Cup and Scottish Cup. ==Results== ===Division 1=== {|class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" ! Match Day ! Date ! Opponent ! H/A ! Score !
